title: Hibernation
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 200 words, Level I (Grade 1), Lexile 480L

description: Have you ever wondered why some animals hibernate during the cold winter months? Where do they sleep? How do they survive? Hibernation provides information about animals that hibernate and how they stay alive during the winter months. Amazing pictures bring the text to life and draw young readers into the book.
comprehension: Compare and Contrast                : Compare and contrast information
awareness: Segment Onset and Rime                : Segment onset and rime
phonics: Vowel Digraphs : Identify vowel digraphs ee and ea
wordWork: Alphabetical Order                : Place words in alphabetical order
